Zot Academy Website

UCI's version of Reddit for Students and Staff

Project Description

Zot Academy is a self-filtering discussion place of questions, answers, and ideas created for the UCI community.

Being an AMA platform, users can ask and answer questions with the ability to edit and delete.

Students and staff can ask just about anything - questions about school events, school topics, housing, or just random things that come to mind.
